text: Amzie Beal (Chappie) Snodgrass (May 18, 1870 – September 9, 1951) was a Major League Baseball outfielder. Snodgrass played for the Baltimore Orioles in the season. In three games, he had one hit in ten at-bats. He batted and threw right-handed. He was born in Springfield, Ohio and died in New York City ==External links== * Category:1870 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Baseball players from Ohio Category:Baltimore Orioles (1901–02) players Category:Baton Rouge Red Sticks players
title: Chappie Snodgrass
